Common package¶

A package of common utilities used in different modules of the project.

Script decos.py¶

Декораторы

common.decos.get_module_name(arg)¶

Method for determining the startup source module (‘client’, ‘server’,…)

common.decos.log_class(cls)¶

Decorator function for Classes

common.decos.log_func(func_to_log)¶

Function decorator for functions

common.decos.login_required(func)¶

A decorator that verifies that the client is authorized on the server. Checks that the transmitted socket object is in the list of authorized clients. Except for the transfer of the dictionary- authorization request. If the client is not logged in, generates a TypeError exception

Script descryptors.py¶

class common.descryptors.Port¶

The descriptor class for the port number. Allows you to use only ports 1023 to 65536. An exception is thrown when trying to set an unsuitable port number.

Script errors.py¶

class common.errors.ServerError(text)¶

Exception - server error

Script metaclasses.py¶

class common.metaclasses.ServerMaker(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

A metaclass that verifies that there are no client calls such as: connect in the resulting class. It is also checked that the server The socket is TCP and works over IPv4 protocol.

class common.metaclasses.ClientMaker(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

A metaclass that verifies that the resulting class does not have server-side calls such as: accept, listen. It is also checked that the socket is not created inside the class constructor.

Script utils.py¶

common.utils. get_message (client)

The function of receiving messages from remote computers. Accepts JSON messages, decodes the received message and verifies that a dictionary has been received.

common.utils. send_message (sock, message)

The function of sending dictionaries via socket. Encodes the dictionary in JSON format and sends it via socket.

Script variables.py¶

Contains various global project variables.

Messenger (PyQt)
